headline: Pennsylvania American Water Completes Acquisition of Farmington Township Water and Wastewater Systems and Signs Agreement to Acquire Corner Water Supply and Service Corporation
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., November 21, 2024--Pennsylvania American Water, a subsidiary of American Water (NYSE: AWK), completed its acquisition of the Farmington Township water and wastewater system in Clarion County. Additionally, the company has signed an agreement to purchase the water system assets of Corner Water Supply and Service Corporation, another Clarion County drinking water provider. Combined, these systems will be acquired for approximately $5.8 million and serve around 1,100 water and 5
